title: Mobile workforce management
text:
Mobile workforce management Sponsored by 
Clevest Solutions has released the latest version of its Mobile Workforce Management (MWM) solution. Building on the technical advances of release 5.1 that delivered high location and situational awareness, Clevest MWM 5.2 delivers enhanced Enterprise Scheduling and Appointment Booking modules that are now accessed via Clevest WorkSpace. The technology enables utility crews with a highly intuitive user interface and intelligent e-forms with integrated digital maps to visualize their work in relation to their asset infrastructure.
